item.title: Cat Quest III ‘Mew Content’ update now available, adds new quests, dungeons, bosses, and gear
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/cat-quest-iii-mew-content-update-now-available-adds-new-quests-dungeons-bosses-and-gear

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Sniff out secrets, meet new characters, and cross paths with familiar faces.

Publisher Kepler Interactive and developer The Gentlebros have released a free “Mew Content” update for open-world action RPG Cat Quest III, which adds new side quests, dungeons, bosses, and gear.

Here is an overview of the update:

  • Five New Side Quests – Sniff out secrets, meet claw-some new characters, and paw-sibly cross paths with some familiar furry faces!
  • Four New Dungeons – Test your whiskers with new puzzles, claw-ver gameplay mechanics, and thrilling surprises waiting to be unearthed!
  • Three New Boss Fights – Face off against fearsome foes in heart-pounding battles that’ll have you clawing for glory!
  • New Gear Galore – Gear up for adventure with shiny new loot that’ll have you pouncing into action with style.

Cat Quest III is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

“Mew Content” Update Trailer

item.title: FANTASTIC NIGHT DREAMS COTTOn coming to PS4, Switch on November 28 via Arcade Archives
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/fantastic-night-dreams-cotton-coming-to-ps4-switch-on-november-28-via-arcade-archives

  • PS4
  • Switch

Priced at $7.99.

Hamster Corporation will release SUCCESS Corporation shoot ’em up FANTASTIC NIGHT DREAMS COTTOn as an Arcade Archives title for PlayStation 4 and Switch on November 28 for $7.99 / £5.79 / €6.99 / 837 yen, the company announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Hamster Corporation:

FANTASTIC NIGHT DREAMS COTTOn is a shooter released by SUCCESS in 1991.

Control the main character, COTTON, and use shots, bombs, and magic to exterminate the beast hearts that rule the fairy world with fear.
This shooter boasts gameplay that can be enjoyed by both enthusiasts and beginners.

The Arcade Archives series has faithfully reproduced many classic arcade masterpieces.

Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.

Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.

Watch a trailer below.

Official Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Famitsu Review Scores: Issue 1876
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/famitsu-review-scores-issue-1876

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

FANTASIAN Neo Dimension and more scored.

This week’s Famitsu review scores are in.

  • FANTASIAN Neo Dimension (PS5, PS4, Xbox Series, Switch) – 8/9/9/8 [34/40]
  • Hakoniwa Kaitaku Hamster to Taiyou no Sato (Switch) – 6/6/5/6 [23/40]
  • Hone Hone Zaurus X Chou Gattai! Build & Battle (Switch) – 8/8/8/7 [31/40]
  • Pacific Drive (PS5) – 8/8/8/8 [32/40]
  • REDNEG ALLSTARS SWING-BY EDITION (Switch) – 8/8/8/8 [32/40]

Thanks, Ryokutya2089.

item.title: NetEase Games studio Worlds Untold ‘pauses operations’ as it seeks new partner
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/netease-games-studio-worlds-untold-pauses-operations-as-it-seeks-new-partner

Mass Effect writer-led studio was developing near-future action adventure game.

Worlds Untold, a studio led by Mass Effect series writer Mac Walters and established in November 2023 as a NetEase Games subsidiary, has made the “difficult decision to pause operations” as it searches for a new partner, Walters said in a LinkedIn update. It was developing a near-future action adventure game set in a “breathtaking world filled with mystery and exploration.”

“It’s hard to find the right words for this, but I wanted to share that we’ve made the very difficult decision to pause operations at Worlds Untold while we search for a new partner to help bring our vision to life,” Walter said. “This was not a decision we made lightly—it’s been a deeply personal journey, and we’re all so proud of everything this team has built together.”

While this was not announced as an outright closure, the studio is currently focused on helping its team members connect with other companies to explore new opportunities.

Walters continued, “This is a heartbreaking moment for everyone involved, but I’m deeply grateful for the support of our partners, friends, and family, and for the time we’ve had together at Worlds Untold. While we’re pausing for now, this isn’t goodbye—there’s more to come, and we look forward to sharing the next chapter with you when the time is right.”
